refnamediv.refpurpose: Clears output written to a string output or to an HTTP

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This clears any previous output to the stream. If the stream is omitted or 0 the stream is the HTTP client stream of the calling procedure.
All output from VSP page procedures is buffered into a local string stream before being sent out. This is done so as to support the HTTP/1.1 required content length and to allow recovery from errors.

refsect2.title: stream
refsect2.para: Optional stream to clear. Null or zero (0) implies the default HTTP client stream.
